channel.title: How do you make your NPCS announce?
channel.description:
Hello.
Currently experiencing the feeling of what it's like to be a server owner. I'd just like to know something for my new server. What do I search/edit to make NPCS announce on my server, "Join the forums at (Board here)" <- As an example.
Thanks.

item.title: How do you make your NPCS announce?
item.dc:creator: @dark24 dark24
item.description:
@dark24 wrote:

Go into your NPCHandler.java, then copy the first code after “moo” then change the NPCid= to the npc id #

and then just change the text.

–Dark

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make your NPCS announce?

item.title: How do you make your NPCS announce?
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

You can,

Open up NpcHandler.Java,
Hold Ctrl and F,
Search,

"Moo"

Copy all of that Static,
Paste it above,
Then edit the NpcId and the Speech.

Read full topic
